channel.title: Client Problem (562)
channel.description: When i make a 562 i usually use khanz ip changer for friends to connect as a client. But this time whenever they try and log in they just lose control of there character and start no clipping through walls. Any help would be great. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,484831.0.html this is the source i'm using. And if you know any good 562 ipchanger clients please tell me because i need to get this server working properly :L PLEEEEAASSSEEE HEEELLPPP!!!!

item.title: Client Problem (562)
item.dc:creator: @defer48 defer48
item.description:
@defer48 wrote:

mine actually does but thats not the main problem. The problem is that they cant control there character…

CAN ANYONE HELP?!?!?!?!?
